item.name: Books REST Service

request.description: Creates a new book record in the Library with given details.
Gets the details of all the books that are registered with the Library.
Gets the details of the specific book from the library based on given bookId.
Updates the specific given book in the Library with the provided details.
Deletes the book details of given book Id from the Library.
Deletes all the books details from the Library.

item.description: REST service responsible for performing CRUD operations on Books store.

item.name: Members REST Service

request.description: Creates a new member record in the library with given details.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

request.description: Gets the details of all the members who are registered with the library.
Gets the details of the specific member based on the given memberId.
Updates the specific member with the provided details.
Deletes the member details of given memberId from the library.
Deletes all the members details from the Library.

item.description: REST service responsible for performing CRUD operations on Members store.

item.name: CRITIC REST Service

request.description: Gets the weights of all the attributes (price, pages, readCount, readersRating, criticsRating) estimated using CRITIC method.
Gets the specified attribute weight that is estimated using CRITIC method.

item.description: Computes the weights of attributes (price, pages, readCount, readersRating, criticsRating) using CRITIC method.

item.name: TOPSIS REST Service

request.description: Gets the TOPSIS performance scores for the given books using CRITIC method to estimate weights of all the attributes(price, pages, readCount, readersRating, criticsRating)

response.name: Calculate TOPSIS scores

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

item.name: Calculate TOPSIS score of specific book

request.description: Gets the TOPSIS performance score for the specified book across all the given books using CRITIC method to estimate weights of all the attributes(price, pages, readCount, readersRating, criticsRating).

response.name: Calculate TOPSIS score of specific book

item.name: Notification REST Service

request.description: Sends the the notification to all the administrators with given subject and message.
Sends the the notification to given member Id with provided subject and message.

item.description: Handles sending the notifications to given email address with provided subjects and messages.

item.name: Profile Management REST Service

request.description: Registers a member with provided basic details and with ACTIVE status. Lastly, sends a successful registration notification to member.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

request.description: Views the profile of given memberId.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

request.description: Increases or decreases the max books a member can borrow and notifies the member about new limit. Can only be run by Librarian/Admin.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

request.description: Cancels the membership of given memberId along with sending notification.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

request.description:
http://localhost:8080/api/profile/payDues/{memberId}

This REST service is used to pay the accumulated dues by the member.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

item.description: A Composite service that manages the profiles registrations, cancellations, limit increases, viewing and paying dues along with sending notifications.

item.name: Books Transactions REST Service

request.description:
http://localhost:8080/api/book/transaction/checkout/{bookRfId}

This Service performs the checkout process of a book, given the bookRfID and memberRfID

response.name: Failed Response Example

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD
GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

request.description:
http://localhost:8080/api/book/transaction/return/{bookRfId}

This service completes the return request of the book given a bookRfID as the input. It ensures the book is already checked out by the user and calculates the fine if user returns the book post the due date.

response.name: Failed Response Example

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD
GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

request.description:
http://localhost:8080/api/book/transaction/renew/{bookRfID}

This Rest API renews a checked-out book given bookRfID as the input. It ensures user doesn't have any accumulated dues and that the book is eligible to be renewed by the user.

response.name: Failed Response Example

item.description: A composite service that handles all the book transactions.

item.name: Rack REST Service
Verify the location of all books

request.description: This REST service verifies the location of all books kept at all racks and sends a notification to the librarian with misplaced/incorrectly placed books.

http://localhost:8080/api/racks/verify/{rackId}/{bookID}

When the user/librarian attempts to place a book at a particular rack, this API responds if the selected rack position is the correct position for given book.

http://localhost:8080/api/racks/verify/{rackId}

This REST service verifies the location of all books kept at a particular rack and sends a notification to the librarian with misplaced/incorrectly placed books.

header.value: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS, HEAD

item.description: A composite service that verifies the book locations.

item.name: Analytics SOAP Service

request.description: Analyzes the total number of books and total cost of all the books.
Analyzes the total number registered members, active members, reader members, librarian members and number of books issued till now.

item.description: A SOAP style service that analyzes the statistics of books and members.
